snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: A Very Brady Sequel
snippet.description: Second far-out spoof is just as neat-o and fun.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: FernGully 2: The Magical Rescue
snippet.description: Sequel lacks the star-power and wit of first film.

snippet.title: Game Review: Command & Conquer Red Alert 3
snippet.description: A rewarding sequel to this campy RTS franchise.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Command & Conquer Red Alert 3
snippet.description: A rewarding sequel to this campy RTS franchise.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Rock Band 2
snippet.description: A great sequel, but you might want the game only.

snippet.title: DVD Review: Space Chimps 2: Zartog Strikes Back
snippet.description: Unnecessary sequel isn't really worth kids' time.

snippet.title: Game Review: Rock Band 2
snippet.description: A great sequel, but you might want the game only.

snippet.title: DVD Review: Back to the Future Part II
snippet.description: Amusing futuristic sequel more dated, edgier than original.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: The Black Stallion Returns
snippet.description: A lackluster sequel to the well-loved original.

snippet.title: Game Review: Crackdown 2
snippet.description: Bloody super-cop shooter sequel for mature gamers.
